item.title: Encoding the $2d$ Ising Model onto $1d$ Qubit Chains
item.description: The $2d$ Ising model is perhaps the most well recognized model in condensed matter and statistical physics and described by the Hamiltonian $$ H = -\sum_{\langle i,j\rangle}\tilde{J}_{ij}S_i S_j $$
